Toews (undisclosed) won't make his return Saturday versus Vegas, per the NHL media site.
Laine (elbow) has been skating in full gear for two days and could return for the Blue Jackets' games in Finland Nov. 4 and 5, Brian Hedger of The Columbus Dispatch reports.
Hughes (undisclosed) is not in Saturday's lineup against Buffalo, Brendan Batchelor of Sportsnet 650 reports.
